information: BRESSUIRE EXPORT is a cattle slaughterhouse located in Bressuire, France. We supply beef and especially fresh meat from young cattle. We also sell carcasses and offal from cattle. Our boned and unboned fresh meat is for Europe and North Africa. We sell meat breeds: Charolaise, Blonde d'Aquitaine, Limousine, Parthenaise, etc.
address: 75 Boulevard Maréchal Foch - Abattoirs De Bressuire,
